main event: A UFO sighting described as an object resembling a flashlight shining through a green filter, observed from military radar near Terre Haute, Indiana.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes., The object was reported as descending., It was detected by military aviation radar., The sighting occurred at night., The radar report classified the object as distinctly round and hazy around the edges, similar to a flashlight through fog.
sighted object: a round object emitting a green light
witness description: Capt. Kenneth P. Brooks and a co-pilot, both students in Aircraft Maintenance Officers Course.
